articles.description: Mouni Roy ups the style quotient in a black Louis Vuitton midi dress and handbag.
articles.content: For her glam make-up, Mouni opted for winged eyeliner, mascara-laden eyelashes, smudged kajal, darkened eyebrows, a dewy base, luminous highlighter, blushed cheeks, contoured cheekbones and a shade o… [+15 chars]
